Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerBoard.resourceLocations

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ConcreteResourceLocation
    ConcreteResourceLocation is the interface for resource locations that directly store resources
    ResourceLocation
    ResourceLocation is the interface for classes in the Board that contain resources
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Depot
    Depot is the class for warehouse depots
    StrongBox
    StrongBox is the class for the player board's strongbox
    Warehouse
    Warehouse is the class for the player board's warehouse
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    InvalidDepotIndexException
    InvalidDepotIndexException is thrown when an invalid index for a Depot is trying to get used
    InvalidDepotSizeException
    InvalidDepotSizeException is thrown when a Depot with an invalid size is trying to get created
    InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
    InvalidResourceLocationOperationException is thrown when an invalid operation to add or remove resources is trying to get executed
